item.title: New version: chemistry/schrodinger version 2024-1
item.description: Schrödinger Suites (Small-molecule Drug Discovery Suite, Material Science Suite, Biologics Suite) provide a set of molecular modelling software.

item.description: Huggingface Accelerate is a library that enables the same PyTorch code to be run across any distributed configuration.

item.description: PyWavelets is a free Open Source library for wavelet transforms in Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-torchtune version 0.1.1_py312
item.description: torchtune is a PyTorch-native library for easily authoring, fine-tuning and experimenting with LLMs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/rosetta version 3.14
item.description: Rosetta is the premier software suite for modeling macromolecular structures. As a flexible, multi-purpose application, it includes tools for structure prediction, design, and remodeling of proteins and nucleic acids.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-scons version 4.7.0_py312
item.description: SCons is an Open Source software construction tool.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/lammps version 20230802
item.description: LAMMPS is a classical molecular dynamics code that models an ensemble of particles in a liquid, solid, or gaseous state.

item.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts.

item.title: New version: biology/py-macs2 version 2.2.9.1_py39
item.description: MACS (Model-based Analysis of ChIP-Seq) implements a novel ChIP-Seq analysis method.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-tinygrad version 0.8.0_py312
item.description: tinygrad is a deep learning framework that aims to provide a balance between simplicity and functionality.

item.title: New version: devel/py-h5py version 3.10.0_py312
item.description: The h5py package is a Pythonic interface to the HDF5 binary data format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-mpi4py version 3.1.5_py312
item.description: MPI for Python provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/2/3 specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++ bindings.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-torch-nvidia-apex version 23.08_py312
item.description: A PyTorch Extension
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nccl version 2.20.5
item.description: NCCL (pronounced 'Nickel') is a stand-alone library of standard collective communication routines, such as all-gather, reduce, broadcast, etc., that have been optimized to achieve high bandwidth over PCIe.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-datasets version 2.18.0_py312
item.description: Hugging Face Datasets is a library for easily accessing and sharing datasets for Audio, Computer Vision, and Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks.

item.description: pandas is an open source, BSD-licensed library providing high-performance, easy-to-use data structures and data analysis tools for the Python programming language.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-transformers version 4.39.1_py312
item.description: Hugging Face Transformers provides APIs and tools to easily download and train state-of-the-art pretrained models.

item.description: Matplotlib is a Python 2D plotting library which produces publication quality figures in a variety of hardcopy formats and interactive environments across platforms.

item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
